name: multiverse_mars_rover
description: - Use any programming language you want. - It shouldn’t take longer than 2-3 hours. - Don’t worry if you don’t finish in the time. Please send over what you’ve achieved and a few sentences on what you would add next. - Please do not implement any UI for this. We just want to see the quality of your code - the console is fine for output. - Put your code online (e.g. in GitLab/GitHub) and send us the link.
